data.name: Turbo Light Rush
data.detailed_description:
In the Future - News & Informations

INCOMING NEXT UPDATE : If you like the game, and it has some success, the Steam Achivements system will be set up and programmed. For the moment the scoring system is planned and designed but it will be programmed and integrated into the game during a future update.

Stay informed, and when it's ready, try to break the record on each level! A global scoreboard is also under study and will eventually be included in this update.


About the Game

Run&Gun automatic in which you will have to go through levels with retro-futuristic aesthetics, and fight your way through the obstacles and enemies that will be waiting for you, to save your friends, and repel the invasion of your planet by a ruthless alien race!
Collect all bonuses and maximize your score.

12 levels available for the main campaign
4 worlds with their own DA
1 Endless level in which the race never stops!
Replay all your levels endlessly!
Unlock Hardcore mode and complete the game in a single run without dying!
Control your character with Z, Space, and Right Shift to jump, dash, and shoot!

Jump, shoot, and dash through the levels, and earn maximum points. Follow the bonus path to find the right path to follow and maximize your score!

data.short_description: Automatic Run&Gun containing 12 levels with retro-futuristic aesthetics. Make the best score !

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i3
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD 520
  • Storage: 380 MB available space
